name: Dungeon Hearts Blitz
description:
◆A Brand New Action Puzzle Dungeon Hearts Blitz◆

Challenge diverse dungeons and level up your characters in a brand new Action Puzzle RPG!

Dungeon Hearts Blitz puzzle command is as simple as it gets.
2 simple taps to play and build your combinations.

Explore the depth of strategic game play behind the simple puzzle commands.
Each character has its unique attacking target area and the challenge is yours to best utilize the characters.

Unique rune system with dozens of special skills and effects in combat.
Experience unique fever mode in Dungeon Hearts Blitz, activated by multiple consecutive puzzle combos in the game.
Maximize your puzzle matching speed in fever modes to win challenging battles.

Challenge and clear all 150 dungeons in the game.
Adventure through the dungeons with unique monsters and their formations.
Party up with friend's characters to clear boss stages.

◈Experience the brand new Action Puzzle RPG, Dungeon Hearts Blitz:
1. Simple combat command with 2 taps
2. Combine and enchant unique runes and characters
3. Enjoy the game with friends
4. 150 Dungeons with unique strategic game plays
